# <a name="add-a-holiday-calendar-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="d3f39-102">Legge til en feriekalender i Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d3f39-102">Add a holiday calendar in Outlook.com</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="d3f39-103">Nederst på siden, velger du Kalender-ikonet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d3f39-103">At the bottom of the page, select the calendar icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="d3f39-104">[Gå til kalenderen](https://outlook.live.com/mail/calendar).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d3f39-104">to [go to Calendar](https://outlook.live.com/mail/calendar).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="d3f39-105">I den venstre ruten velger du **Legg til kalender** > **Interessante kalendere** > **helligdager**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d3f39-105">In the left pane, select **Add calendar** > **Interesting Calendars** > **Holidays**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="d3f39-106">Velg helligdager kalenderen du vil bruke, og velg deretter **X** i det øverste hjørnet for å lagre valget og lukke vinduet **Legg til kalender** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d3f39-106">Select the holiday calendar you want and then select **X** in the top corner to save your choice and close the **Add calendar** window.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d3f39-107">Lær mer om [å legge til eller fjerne fødselsdag og ferie kalendere](https://support.office.com/article/b8e636da-fda8-413f-940e-68396efa49a6?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d3f39-107">Learn more about [adding or removing birthday and holiday calendars](https://support.office.com/article/b8e636da-fda8-413f-940e-68396efa49a6?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
